articles.author: New Scientist and Press Association
articles.title: Coronavirus: UK government reveals action plan to combat an outbreak
articles.description: The UK government has published a 27-page document detailing how the country will respond to a growing covid-19 outbreak. Police and health workers may be restricted to urgent duties
articles.content:
By New Scientist and Press Association
The UK is preparing for an outbreak of covid-19
Yui Mok/PA Wire/PA Images
The coronavirus outbreak could lead to a fifth of workers in the UK staying at home, cause the police to drop low-priority cases and force the … [+2112 chars]
